alert.note: Alert for McDonald; Newton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 4:17AM CDT until April 05 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Newton County in southwestern Missouri... Western McDonald County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 500 AM CDT. * At 417 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near South West City, or 13 miles west of Pineville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Neosho, Seneca, Anderson, Noel, Dodge, Goodman, South West City, Lanagan, Stella, Cayuga, Stark City and Tiff City. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 4 and 22. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
